subject: Ultra clutch
description_text:
I was trying to make some adjustments to my clutch pedal and some washers fell away and I didnâ€™t see where they came from. Do you have an exploded parts diagram available? 

Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Kris Borden,  Please take a photo and send it to me, and I will guide you on how to restore it. The user manual should also include instructions for this.Â

I just need to know where the washers go on the bar that holds the spring in the pedal as there are 2 different types of washers. 


Sent from my iPhone

>
